scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend && npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:frontend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && npm install --include=dev && npx prisma generate
scripts.migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.start: npm run migrate && cd backend && npm run start:prod
scripts.postinstall: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend && npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:frontend && npm run migrate
